location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Henry Moore and Dymoke Lyster, East India Company Agent and Council at Bussora [Basra], to William Bowyear and James Morley, East India Company Resident and factor at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter examines Meer Mahanna [Mīr Muhanna] and his position in the Gulf, especially relations with Carim Caun [Karim Khan]. The idea of an alliance with the Mīr and a settlement on Carrack [Kharg] is discussed. The Khan's fleet is also defined and reasons given for destroying it.
